snippet: Opposition leaders scrambled to harness a spontaneous eruption of anger on the second day of demonstrations.
abstract: Opposition leaders in Jordan scramble to harness spontaneous eruption of anger over increased gas prices that has spread throughout kingdom, taking officials by surprise; demonstrations have stretched into second day and are most aggressive in two years.

byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN and RANYA KADRI

lead_paragraph: Opposition leaders scrambled to harness a spontaneous eruption of anger on the second day of demonstrations.

headline.seo: Jordan Protests Turn Deadly on Second Day
headline.main: Protests Over Gas Prices in Jordan Turn Deadly
headline.print_headline: Protests Over Gas Prices in Jordan Turn Deadly

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
